short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate MD5 and SHA-1 hash values in your own browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This application produces MD5 and SHA-1 hash values. Unlike other web-based hash function services, which produce hash values in their servers, this application works in your own browser. Your files will never be sent to our servers. So, the privacy of your files will be protected.

This app is a Native Client application that only works with the Chrome browser.

This application uses open source software from the following sources.
